University Name

Professional Experience

Principal and Professor (Pharmacology)

Government Medical College, Haridwar

Present

Leading the institution as Principal while teaching pharmacology to medical students, conducting research in pharmacovigilance, and contributing to the development of rational drug use policies.

Founder Coordinator

Adverse Drug Monitoring Centre, GDMC Dehradun

Established and coordinated the Adverse Drug Monitoring Centre at Government Doon Medical College, Dehradun.

Founder Member Secretary

Institutional Ethics Committee

Founded and served as Member Secretary of Institutional Ethics Committee of GDMC Dehradun and VCSGGIMSR Srinagar.

Research Interests

  • Rational Use of Medicines
  • Clinical Pharmacy
  • Drug Information
  • Patient Safety
  • Pharmacovigilance
  • Medical Education

Teaching Experience & Awards

Extensive experience in teaching pharmacology to undergraduate and postgraduate medical students. Developed innovative teaching methodologies to enhance student engagement and learning outcomes.

Awarded Best Teacher at Government Doon Medical College, Dehradun in 2017.

Organized training programs on Pharmacovigilance and drug-related interactions for Nursing and Paramedical Staff of GDMC Dehradun and GMC Almora.

Publications

Author of more than 30 research papers published in national and international journals. Complete list available on the Publications page.
